mapper.select: SELECT A.USER_ID AS USER_ID -- 사용자ID , A.PASSWORD AS PASSWORD -- 비밀번호 , A.USER_NM AS USER_NM -- 사용자명 , A.DEL_YN as DEL_YN -- 삭제여부 , C.CENTER_ID AS MAIN_CENTER_ID -- 대표 센터ID , C.CENTER_NM AS MAIN_CENTER_NM -- 대표 센터명 , A.REMARK AS REMARK -- 리마크 , A.REMEMBER_YN AS REMEMBER_YN -- 로그인 유지 여부 , A.REG_ID AS REG_ID -- 등록자ID , A.REG_DT AS REG_DT -- 등록일시 , A.UPD_ID AS UPD_ID -- 수정자ID , A.UPD_DT AS UPD_DT -- 수정일시 , A.LVL AS LVL -- 권한 FROM USER A LEFT JOIN USER_TREATMENT_CENTER B ON A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID AND B.MAIN_YN = 'Y' LEFT JOIN TREATMENT_CENTER C ON B.CENTER_ID = C.CENTER_ID AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' WHERE A.USER_ID = #{userId}

SELECT A.USER_ID , A.CENTER_ID , B.CENTER_NM , A.MAIN_YN , A.REG_ID , A.REG_DT FROM USER_TREATMENT_CENTER A INNER JOIN TREATMENT_CENTER B ON A.CENTER_ID = B.CENTER_ID AND B.USE_YN = 'Y' WHERE A.USER_ID = #{userId}

SELECT A.USER_ID AS USER_ID -- 사용자ID , A.PASSWORD AS PASSWORD -- 비밀번호 , A.USER_NM AS USER_NM -- 사용자명 , A.DEL_YN AS DEL_YN -- 삭제여부 , C.CENTER_ID AS MAIN_CENTER_ID -- 대표 센터ID , C.CENTER_NM AS MAIN_CENTER_NM -- 대표 센터명 , A.REMARK AS REMARK -- 리마크 , A.REMEMBER_YN AS REMEMBER_YN -- 로그인 유지 여부 , A.REG_ID AS REG_ID -- 등록자ID , A.REG_DT AS REG_DT -- 등록일시 , A.UPD_ID AS UPD_ID -- 수정자ID , A.UPD_DT AS UPD_DT -- 수정일시 , A.LVL AS LVL -- 권한 FROM USER A LEFT JOIN USER_TREATMENT_CENTER B ON A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID AND B.MAIN_YN = 'Y' LEFT JOIN TREATMENT_CENTER C ON B.CENTER_ID = C.CENTER_ID AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' WHERE A.DEL_YN = 'N'
AND A.USER_ID = #{userId}
AND A.USER_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{userNm}, '%')
AND EXISTS(SELECT NULL FROM USER_TREATMENT_CENTER X WHERE X.USER_ID = A.USER_ID AND X.CENTER_ID = #{centerId})
ORDER BY A.USER_NM
mapper.update: UPDATE USER SET PASSWORD = #{password} -- 비밀번호 , USER_NM = #{userNm} -- 사용자명 , REMARK = #{remark} -- 리마크 , UPD_ID = #{updId} -- 수정자 , UPD_DT = NOW() WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT #{userId} AS USER_ID -- 사용자ID , B.CENTER_ID -- 센터ID , B.CENTER_NM -- 센터명 , A.MAIN_YN -- 메인여부 , A.REG_ID , C.USER_NM AS REG_NM FROM USER_TREATMENT_CENTER A INNER JOIN TREATMENT_CENTER B ON A.CENTER_ID = B.CENTER_ID AND B.USE_YN = 'Y' LEFT JOIN USER C ON A.REG_ID = C.USER_ID WHERE A.USER_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY A.MAIN_YN DESC , B.CENTER_NM
